metadata.title: Three Card Tarot Reading
metadata.description: Ace of Cups, Ace of Wands, 2 of Pentacles

notes: NOT a game - no mobile game controls needed (d-pad/buttons)
Use tap-reveal pattern: cards flip on tap to show meanings
Cards start face-down, tap to reveal artwork and interpretation
CSS transitions for smooth card flip animations
Responsive layout: 3 cards horizontal on desktop, stack on mobile
Touch events: touchstart + click fallback for card flips
Each card section: image placeholder, title, upright meaning, context
Spread positions: Past (Ace of Cups), Present (Ace of Wands), Future (2 of Pentacles)
Typography-focused with cyan headings, sky blue accents
No game loop, no scoring, no win/loss - pure content presentation
Viewport meta tag required for mobile responsiveness
Link to ../page-theme.css for consistent noir theme

userPrompt: <@&1437054123307700348> produce a tarot reading of ace of cups, ace of wands, and 2 of pentacles and make it a webpage

warnings.message: HTML appears to be truncated - missing closing tags
